data.summary: Andy Cao has 15+ years experience specializing in the front-end, mobile apps and casual game development. Able to effectively self-manage during independent projects as well as collaborate in a team setting. The video app which I deeply participated in has obtained over 100 million downloads. The registrations of personal websites has exceeded 2000 per day and the downloads of the games that designed and developed by myself independently has exceeded 1 million times. Super nerd with macOS, Linux and enjoy to automate and optimize the development process and productive workflow. Interest in problem-solving, learning new technologies and tools.

desc: Actively participated in UGC website and SPA project design, architecture and development
Engaged in video app project of mobile native building, publishing and maintaining
Participated in idea, design, prototyping, architecture and development of online causal games
Collaborated with development team, product owner, design team and QA team in identifying website and application problems, testing methods and best solutions.
Worked with backend team to optimize API data structure and reduce bandwidth requests
Designed, architected and implemented large-scale commercial website project with core member of development team
Architected, implemented multi-functional video player (HTML5 version and Flash version) and upload component
Engaged in Facebook online game project HotTickets and Showstopper Basketball targeting U.S. market
Collaborated with customers to understand requirement, test ideas, and refine workflows
Responsible for the development team training, code review and task management
Designed, architected commercial video website for SMEs and implemented the core modules
Architected and developed online customer service products which include live broadcast, online whiteboard and chatting features
Engaged in backend API design and optimization
Built live stream services base on RED5 open source project
Responsible for recruitment and management of development team

works.company: China National Software & Service Co., Ltd.
desc: Implemented and maintained online monitoring system for warehouse which included data presentation, animation and visual effect
Communicated with product owner and design team for building better workflow and product ideas
Participated software system installation, deployment and debugging
Engaged with customers to understand requirements, test ideas, and refine workflows
